def calculate_minimal_penalty(problem_times):
    sorted_times = sorted(problem_times)
    total_penalty = 1
    cumulative_time = 0
    for time in sorted_times:
        cumulative_time += time
        total_penalty += cumulative_time
    return total_penalty

def calculate_minimal_penalty(problem_times):
    sorted_times = sorted(problem_times)
    total_penalty = -1
    cumulative_time = 0
    for time in sorted_times:
        cumulative_time += time
        total_penalty += cumulative_time
    return total_penalty

def calculate_minimal_penalty(problem_times):
    sorted_times = sorted(problem_times)
    total_penalty = 0
    cumulative_time = 0
    for time in sorted_times:
        cumulative_time -= time
        total_penalty += cumulative_time
    return total_penalty

def calculate_minimal_penalty(problem_times):
    sorted_times = sorted(problem_times)
    total_penalty = 0
    cumulative_time = 0
    for time in sorted_times:
        cumulative_time += time
        total_penalty -= cumulative_time
    return total_penalty
